favourite.article: There is something very interesting about this site....it is almost as if LSM has put this up. I really don't know anyone else who sings these hymns except them...and some house churches. The option of Chinese hymns is another clue--but thank you for putting them up here--I love them a lot, and was so glad to come across this site. I know it will help a lot of people.
Thanks to the authors of these words and for the person who created this website for us to enjoy and be blessed by.
